name: Duel Decks: Nissa vs. Ob Nixilis

cards.name: Nissa, Voice of Zendikar
cards.text:
+1: Create a 0/1 green Plant creature token.
−2: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
−7: You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of lands you control.

cards.name: Abundance
cards.text: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Briarhorn
cards.text:
Flash
When Briarhorn enters the battlefield, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Evoke {1}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.flavor: They seek out living trees to glean age-old secrets from sap and wood.
cards.name: Citanul Woodreaders
cards.text:
Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)
When Citanul Woodreaders enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, draw two cards.

cards.flavor: "These alleys are not safe. Come, I can guide you back to the market square."
cards.name: Civic Wayfinder
cards.text: When Civic Wayfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.name: Cloudthresher
cards.text:
Flash
Reach
When Cloudthresher enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature with flying and each player.
Evoke {2}{G}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.flavor: Zendikar's elves have developed innovative methods to mitigate the effects of the Roil.
cards.name: Crop Rotation
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Crop Rotation, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for a land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: "From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."
cards.name: Elvish Visionary
cards.text: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.name: Fertilid
cards.text:
Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches his or her library for a basic land card and puts it onto the battlefield tapped. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Gaea's Blessing
cards.text:
Target player shuffles up to three target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.
Draw a card.
When Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.

cards.flavor: Desmera blinded her seers so that her beauty would be the last image burned in their memories. The act only deepened their insight.
cards.name: Gilt-Leaf Seer
cards.text: {G}, {T}: Look at the top two cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

cards.flavor: Nature's arms encircle all who are willing to draw close.
cards.name: Jaddi Lifestrider
cards.text: When Jaddi Lifestrider enters the battlefield, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. You gain 2 life for each creature tapped this way.

cards.flavor: "Zendikar will not surrender, and neither can we."
cards.name: Natural Connection
cards.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: Once, Nissa selected worthy fighters to defend the Joraga. Now, she gathers forces to defend all of Zendikar.
cards.name: Nissa's Chosen
cards.text: If Nissa's Chosen would die, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead.

cards.flavor: "Roam as you will, your roots remain in the strong earth of your Rising."
cards.name: Oakgnarl Warrior
cards.text: Vigilance, trample

cards.name: Oran-Rief Hydra
cards.text:
Trample
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Oran-Rief Hydra. If that land is a Forest, put two +1/+1 counters on Oran-Rief Hydra instead.

cards.flavor:
"The world was not hostile to us—we were beneath its notice, and presented no danger."
—The Invokers' Tales
cards.name: Oran-Rief Invoker
cards.text: {8}: Oran-Rief Invoker gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"A good lagac will carry you through thick and thin. A bad one . . . well, it's a tasty dinner."
—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter
cards.name: Saddleback Lagac
cards.text: When Saddleback Lagac enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

cards.flavor: Eldrazi are not the leopard's preferred prey, but they are better than no prey at all.
cards.name: Scythe Leopard
cards.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Scythe Leopard gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"The horizon is the perpetual ideal, the constant promise of hope."
—Nissa Revane
cards.name: Seek the Horizon
cards.text: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Thicket Elemental
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.)
When Thicket Elemental enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. If you do, put that card onto the battlefield and shuffle all other cards revealed this way into your library.

cards.flavor: Their arrows are tipped with basilisk eyes and fletched with cockatrice feathers.
cards.name: Thornweald Archer
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.flavor: "The most elegant solutions are found in nature. You just have to know where to look."
cards.name: Vines of the Recluse
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. Untap it. (A creature with reach can block creatures with flying.)

cards.name: Walker of the Grove
cards.text:
When Walker of the Grove leaves the battlefield, create a 4/4 green Elemental creature token.
Evoke {4}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.flavor: Through the waves of Eldrazi attacks, the Murasan jungles seemed to regrow as soon as they were destroyed.
cards.name: Wood Elves
cards.text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: It carries the hopes of Zendikar's embattled wilds on its mighty boughs.
cards.name: Woodborn Behemoth
cards.text: As long as you control eight or more lands, Woodborn Behemoth gets +4/+4 and has trample. (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

cards.name: Fertile Thicket
cards.text:
Fertile Thicket enters the battlefield tapped.
When Fertile Thicket enters the battlefield, you may look at the top five cards of your library. If you do, reveal up to one basic land card from among them, then put that card on top of your library and the rest on the bottom in any order.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Khalni Garden
cards.text:
Khalni Garden enters the battlefield tapped.
When Khalni Garden enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Mosswort Bridge
cards.text:
Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{G}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if creatures you control have total power 10 or greater.

cards.name: Treetop Village
cards.text:
Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

cards.name: Ob Nixilis Reignited
cards.text:
+1: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
−3: Destroy target creature.
−8: Target opponent gets an emblem with "Whenever a player draws a card, you lose 2 life."

cards.flavor:
"I will secure my revenge on Zendikar one soul at a time."
—Ob Nixilis
cards.name: Altar's Reap
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Altar's Reap, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.

cards.flavor:
"Conquering your first world is the hardest, after all. My power grew as I moved from world to world, taking anything that would make the next taking easier."
—Ob Nixilis
cards.name: Ambition's Cost
cards.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

cards.flavor: Fast and lethal, with a penchant for the weak and infirm.
cards.name: Bala Ged Scorpion
cards.text: When Bala Ged Scorpion enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with power 1 or less.

cards.flavor:
"Avoid anything that scuttles, scrabbles, or shambles."
—Opar, veteran guide
cards.name: Blistergrub
cards.text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
When Blistergrub dies, each opponent loses 2 life.

cards.flavor: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.
cards.name: Cadaver Imp
cards.text:
Flying
When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
"Later we will mourn those we have lost. First we must end their suffering."
—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief
cards.name: Carrier Thrall
cards.text: When Carrier Thrall dies, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor:
"Take what solace you can in the knowledge that you will not be here to witness Zendikar's demise."
—Ob Nixilis
cards.name: Demon's Grasp
cards.text: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

cards.name: Desecration Demon
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, tap Desecration Demon and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.flavor: Rats and vultures devour. It desecrates.
cards.name: Despoiler of Souls
cards.text:
Despoiler of Souls can't block.
{B}{B}, Exile two other creature cards from your graveyard: Return Despoiler of Souls from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.flavor: "Brave scar or unfortunate tale? It all depends on your pain threshold."
cards.name: Disfigure
cards.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"One little word was all it took. The world shook as I said it. The doom of Zendikar was here at last."
—Ob Nixilis
cards.name: Doom Blade
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

cards.name: Fetid Imp
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Fetid Imp gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.flavor: The imp, unaware of its own odor, paused to catch its breath . . . and promptly died.
cards.name: Foul Imp
cards.text:
Flying
When Foul Imp enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life.

cards.flavor: Its sting hurts, but death is strangely painless.
cards.name: Giant Scorpion
cards.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.flavor: Few among the living understand just how much of their world is shaped by the ruins of the dead.
cards.name: Grim Discovery
cards.text:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
"A little dark magic won't stop me. The worse the curse, the better the prize."
—Radavi, Joraga relic hunter, last words
cards.name: Hideous End
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

cards.flavor: The promise of anguish is payment enough for services rendered.
cards.name: Indulgent Tormentor
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card unless target opponent sacrifices a creature or pays 3 life.

cards.flavor: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.
cards.name: Innocent Blood
cards.text: Each player sacrifices a creature.

cards.flavor: As the bridge snapped, Berko was sure he heard the swamp laughing at him.
cards.name: Mire's Toll
cards.text: Target player reveals a number of cards from his or her hand equal to the number of Swamps you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.

cards.flavor: "I have schemed too long to be supplanted by dead gods. If I cannot have this world, no one can."
cards.name: Pestilence Demon
cards.text:
Flying
{B}: Pestilence Demon deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

cards.flavor: Some will sacrifice everything for but a taste of power.
cards.name: Priest of the Blood Rite
cards.text:
When Priest of the Blood Rite enters the battlefield, create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.

cards.name: Quest for the Gravelord
cards.text:
Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord.
Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.

cards.flavor: Confront it at your own peril, for it will confront you for its own amusement.
cards.name: Renegade Demon
Shadows of the Past
cards.text:
Whenever a creature dies, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{4}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Activate this ability only if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: Take away a few things, and a rebellion may ensue. Take away everything, and the oppression will be accepted as fate.
cards.name: Smallpox
cards.text: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.

cards.flavor: Setting foot in their muck is an open invitation.
cards.name: Squelching Leeches
cards.text: Squelching Leeches's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

cards.flavor: Darkness doesn't always send its minions to do its dirty work.
cards.name: Tendrils of Corruption
cards.text: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.

cards.flavor: Agreements with demons seldom end at the grave.
cards.name: Unhallowed Pact
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Leechridden Swamp
cards.text:
({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)
Leechridden Swamp enters the battlefield tapped.
{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life. Activate this ability only if you control two or more black permanents.

cards.name: Eldrazi Scion
cards.text: Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Demon
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Elemental
cards.text: Trample
